arStrings.szText: If you become Crowd Controlled, Varyana leaps towards the enemy that inflicted it, dealing {if:SF_4}{c_number}{payload:LEAP_PAYLOAD_TOOLTIP}{/c}{else}heavy{/if} Physical damage and Knocking Down surrounding enemies for {c_number}{SF_3}{/c} seconds on impact. Can only occur once every {c_number}[{SF_0}]{/c} seconds.
